rules.name: Annual Contract Value
rules.description: The annual price of the contract after the discount.

rules.name: Non-Recurring Revenue
rules.description: The price of the one-time product after the discount.  The system shall reflect the $0.00 NRR Contract Totals if there are only recurring products in the quote;

rules.name: Annual Recurring Revenue
rules.description: The annual price of the recurring product after discount.  ARR is the metric reflecting the price for 12 months even if the contract term is less than 12 months.

rules.name: Monthly Recurring Revenue
rules.description: The price per month of the recurring product after discount.

rules.name: Total Contract Value
rules.description: It is the price for the whole contract after discount.
